fields.title: maximum likelihood in exponential families
fields.pointers:
*  [Estimating the parameters of a Markov random field (MRF)](mrf_parameter_learning)  is a surprising example of maximum likelihood in exponential families. 
*  [Bayesian parameter estimation](bayesian_parameter_estimation)  often has a  [convenient form](bayes_param_exp_fam)  in exponential families.
fields.summary: For any exponential family model, the maximum likelihood parameters are such that the model moments match the data moments.
